channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1968|2024-09-16T17:18:25.795Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 153749.

item.title: CVE-2018-1453|2024-09-16T16:48:32.997Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager Virtual Appliance 7.0 allows an authenticated attacker to upload or transfer files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the environment. IBM X-Force ID: 140055.

item.title: CVE-2019-4675|2024-09-16T16:28:34.866Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 7.0.1 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 171511.

item.title: CVE-2019-4451|2024-09-16T17:49:00.944Z -- ibm -- security%20identity%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Identity Manager 6.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 163493.
